channel.title: Trading Kaiju drops and other runes and goodies
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Trading Kaiju drops and other runes and goodies"

item.title: Trading Kaiju drops and other runes and goodies
item.content:encoded:
Need:
Sho nuff elixir
Money printer
Lab Coat
SB pages
Bow of Windia
Shiny belt
Monkey Cymbals

If you have any of these please pm me.

Have:
Carapace armor
12 super pots
5 k-dogs headands
3 stealth suits
3 necklace hocage
2 Love love paradise
2 Codec
3 Dartboard
10 Glowing Goo
20 Shamrocks

PM with offers (preferably in game)
